What&#39;s up all? So I&#39;m curious if anyone can point me in the direction of a good video on how to play Dungeon World? Not a live play, more like an instructional video. Something that actually points out the moves, how to GM correctly and all that. Thanks everyone!
<div id='comment z13wejahdmeuh35c323be3xayrrevp02y'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/100410765634052727875_photo.jpg'> Addramyr Palinor</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-10-10 12:11:39 (edited: 2017-10-10 12:11:39)</cite></p>
        <p>Dunno how &quot;instructional&quot; it is but it does cover the basic principles/ideas behind DW in a fun way!<br /><br />Ma&#39; man, classic ol&#39; Hankerin!<br /><br /><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NQ_7csMAFZU" data-embed="_-gsKMjAxNS0xMS0wNooNGFVDQ2g1dnRvOEpGc3RiOVNtYTl6VjI1Z5INC05RXzdjc01BRlpV-hEraHR0cHM6Ly93d3cueW91dHViZS5jb20vd2F0Y2g_dj1OUV83Y3NNQUZaVQ" data-attachment-render-hint="1" class="ot-anchor">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NQ_7csMAFZU</a></p>

<div id='comment z13wejahdmeuh35c323be3xayrrevp02y'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/106559411917886711211_photo.jpg'> Gerke Bouma</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-10-10 18:37:52 (edited: 2017-10-10 18:37:52)</cite></p>
        <p>I&#39;d recommend reading the actual book/pdf as well as the players guide mentioned above. Being relatively new to DW myself, i&#39;d also recommend listening to the Discern Realities podcast, which includes some (very brief) actual play in each episode along with tons and tons of good advice on playing &amp; GMing DW.</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13wejahdmeuh35c323be3xayrrevp02y'>

        <p>The 16 HP dragon example was also really helpful for me to have things &#39;click&#39; in my head when I started out. Can&#39;t link atm, but simply googling it should work.</p>
</div>
